cab.content: [14 & 15 GeO. 5.] Irish Free State(Confirmation of Agreement),to confirm a certain Agreement supplementing a.d. 1924. Article Twelve of the Articles of Agreement for a Treaty between Great Britain and Ireland to which the force of law was given by the Irish Free State (Agreement) Act, 1922, and by the Constitution of the Irish Free State (Saorstat Eireann) Act, 1922.)E it enacted by the King's most Excellent Majesty, by and with the advice and consent of the Lords Spiritual and Temporal, and Commons, in this present Parliament assembled, and by the authority of the same, 5 as follows: 1. The Agreement set forth in the Schedule to this Confirma-Act, being an agreement supplementing Article Twelve tion of of the Articles of Agreement for a treaty between Great &gcesmeni-Britain and Ireland to which the force of law was given by the Irish Eree State (Agreement) Act, 1922, and by the Constitution of the Irish Eree State (Saorstat Eireann) Act, 1922, is hereby confirmed, and the said Articles of Agreement for a treaty and the Irish Eree State (Agreement) Act, 1922, shall have effect accordingly.2. (1) This Act may be cited as the Irish Free Snort titleState (Confirmation of Agreement) Act, 1924. and oom" ,v - ' meneement.[Bill 252] ABILLTo confirm a certain Agreement supple-menting Article Twelve of the Articles of Agreement for a Treaty between Great Britain and Ireland which the force of law was given by the Irish Free State (Agreement) Act, 1922, and by the Constitution of the Irish Free State (Saorstat Eireann) Act, 1922.Presented by Mr. Secretary Thomas,supported by The Prime Minister, Mr. Clynes and Mr. Secretary Henderson.Ordered, by The House of Commons, to be Printed, 6 August 192A.X O N7D O N :PUBLISHED BY HIS MAJESTY'S STATIONERY OFFICE.. .
